message.name: B13
message.say: , Wow, that's it!

message.name: B14
message.say: you really helped me today! Thank you so much! I hope I can get the job!

message.name: B15
message.say: Hi Cristina! I'm great. Now that I have a new place to live and a new credit card. I think I am ready to look for a new job!

message.name: B16
message.say: I just think I need some help filling out the application online. I'm not so good with computers.

message.name: B17
message.say: That sounds perfect Cristina!

message.name: B18
message.say: can you help with a few problem areas?

message.name: B19
message.say: Let's see if we can figure this out together

message.name: B20
message.say: . When filling out an application, what information should you be prepared to give an employer? I think all of this information is important. Which do you think is best?

message.name: B21
message.say: Got it Cristina! This is really helping me to better understand.

message.name: B22
message.say: Here's the next question

message.name: B23
message.say: . Why is important to be completely honest when filling out an application? I think it is important to always be honest but if I had to choose I think it just shows you have bad morals.

message.name: B24
message.say: Oh, that is important information to remember.

message.name: B25
message.say: Which position do you think I should apply for? Check my resume if you need

message.name: B26
message.say: That is a great choice! I enjoy serving customers and have the experience.

message.name: B27
message.say: I'm not sure which skills best show that I can talk to customers. What would you choose? Just type your answer below. The choices are underlined in this job posting I found.

message.name: B28
message.say: That is important to speaking with customers. I didn't even consider it. Awesome!

message.name: B29
message.say: and Cristina I told you I was not good with computers! I can't believe I selected the wrong button.

message.name: B30
message.say: Oops! I did graduate and what a silly mistake! I am glad we caught it before I turned in my application.

message.name: B31
message.say: Alright Cristina, I think I'm getting this!

message.name: B32
message.say: Which reference do you think is best for applying to Eastside Grill? You can type your answer into the boxes with the red star next them.

message.name: B33
message.say: Well, I am pretty good at washing cars.
